```{r}
library(sf)
lcext <- st_as_sf(data.frame(x=c(383937.2,384907.0), y=c(6461225.8,6462354.4)),
                  coords=c("x","y"),crs=st_crs(32750))
```

```{r fig.height=16.0, fig.width=14}
library(maptiles)
lcmap <- get_tiles(lcext, provider = "Thunderforest.Outdoors",
                      apikey="03b0375e8e7c47d0a03018a9001de439", 
                      crop = TRUE, zoom=16, verbose = F)
plot_tiles(lcmap)
# axis(1, mgp=c(-3,-2,-1));axis(2, mgp=c(-3,-2,-1))
par("usr")
```
